titleStmt.title: The pleasant and delightful history of King Henry the VIII, and the Abbot of Reading Declaring how the King dined with the Abbot of Reading, and how the King brought the Abbot to a good stomach, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. M[illet]. for Charles Dennisson, at the Stationers-Arms, within Aldgate,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from and date conjectured by
The final leaf, B4, has blank recto; woodcut on verso.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
